name: Creamy Bacon-Wrapped Baked Chicken Thighs
author: Diana71
summary: Deliciously slow-cooked in the oven, these chicken skewers make a fun party dish!
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spread chicken thighs out flat and pound if necessary with a meat mallet
Spread cream cheese across each thigh
Roll up chicken thighs, tucking in the sides
Wrap each chicken roll with at least 1 slice of bacon and secure with a skewer
Place chicken rolls in a deep casserole dish
Pour entire can of condensed cream of chicken soup over the chicken rolls
Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes
Continue cooking until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear and bacon is crisp, 20 more minutes
